Yii Framework v2.0.0-dev Class Reference

Abstract Class yii\data\BaseDataProvider

All Classes | Properties | Methods
Inheritanceyii\data\BaseDataProvider » yii\base\Component » yii\base\Object
Implementsyii\base\Arrayable, yii\data\DataProviderInterface
Subclassesyii\data\ActiveDataProvider, yii\data\ArrayDataProvider, yii\data\SqlDataProvider
Available since version2.0
Source Code
BaseDataProvider provides a base class that implements the yii\data\DataProviderInterface.

Hide inherited properties

$totalCount integer total number of possible data models yii\data\BaseDataProvider
$pagination yii\data\Pagination|boolean the pagination object yii\data\BaseDataProvider
$sort yii\data\Sort|boolean the sorting object yii\data\BaseDataProvider

Protected Methods

Hide inherited methods

MethodDescriptionDefined By
prepareModels() Prepares the data models that will be made available in the current page. yii\data\BaseDataProvider

prepareTotalCount() Returns a value indicating the total number of data models in this data provider. yii\data\BaseDataProvider

Property Details

$id property
string $id = null

An ID that uniquely identifies the data provider among all data providers. You should set this property if the same page contains two or more different data providers. Otherwise, the $pagination and $sort mainly not work properly.

$behaviors property read-only
yii\base\Behavior[] getBehaviors( )

list of behaviors attached to this component

$models property
array getModels( )
void setModels( $models )

the list of data models in the current page.

$keys property
array getKeys( )
void setKeys( $keys )

the list of key values corresponding to $models. Each data model in $models is uniquely identified by the corresponding key value in this array.

$count property read-only
integer getCount( )

the number of data models in the current page.

$totalCount property
integer getTotalCount( )
void setTotalCount( $value )

total number of possible data models.

$pagination property
yii\data\Pagination|boolean getPagination( )
void setPagination( $value )

the pagination object. If this is false, it means the pagination is disabled.

$sort property
yii\data\Sort|boolean getSort( )
void setSort( $value )

the sorting object. If this is false, it means the sorting is disabled.

Method Details

prepareModels() method
array prepareModels( )
return array the available data models

Prepares the data models that will be made available in the current page.

prepareKeys() method
array prepareKeys( $models )
$models array The available data models
return array the keys

Prepares the keys associated with the currently available data models.

prepareTotalCount() method
integer prepareTotalCount( )
return integer total number of data models in this data provider.

Returns a value indicating the total number of data models in this data provider.

prepare() method
void prepare( $forcePrepare = false )
$forcePrepare boolean Whether to force data preparation even if it has been done before.

Prepares the data models and keys.

This method will prepare the data models and keys that can be retrieved via getModels() and getKeys().

This method will be implicitly called by getModels() and getKeys() if it has not been called before.

getModels() method
array getModels( )
return array the list of data models in the current page.

Returns the data models in the current page.

setModels() method
void setModels( $models )
$models array The models in the current page

Sets the data models in the current page.

getKeys() method
array getKeys( )
return array the list of key values corresponding to $models. Each data model in $models is uniquely identified by the corresponding key value in this array.

Returns the key values associated with the data models.

setKeys() method
void setKeys( $keys )
$keys array The list of key values corresponding to $models.

Sets the key values associated with the data models.

getCount() method
integer getCount( )
return integer the number of data models in the current page.

Returns the number of data models in the current page.

getTotalCount() method
integer getTotalCount( )
return integer total number of possible data models.

Returns the total number of data models.

When $pagination is false, this returns the same value as $count. Otherwise, it will call prepareTotalCount() to get the count.

setTotalCount() method
void setTotalCount( $value )
$value integer The total number of data models.

Sets the total number of data models.

getPagination() method
yii\data\Pagination|boolean getPagination( )
return yii\data\Pagination|boolean the pagination object. If this is false, it means the pagination is disabled.

Returns the pagination object used by this data provider.

Note that you should call prepare() or getModels() first to get correct values of yii\data\Pagination::$totalCount and yii\data\Pagination::$pageCount.

setPagination() method
void setPagination( $value )
$value array|yii\data\Pagination|boolean The pagination to be used by this data provider. This can be one of the following: - a configuration array for creating the pagination object. The "class" element defaults to 'yii\data\Pagination' - an instance of yii\data\Pagination or its subclass - false, if pagination needs to be disabled.
throws yii\base\InvalidParamException

Sets the pagination for this data provider.

getSort() method
yii\data\Sort|boolean getSort( )
return yii\data\Sort|boolean the sorting object. If this is false, it means the sorting is disabled.

setSort() method
void setSort( $value )
$value array|yii\data\Sort|boolean The sort definition to be used by this data provider. This can be one of the following: - a configuration array for creating the sort definition object. The "class" element defaults to 'yii\data\Sort' - an instance of yii\data\Sort or its subclass - false, if sorting needs to be disabled.
throws yii\base\InvalidParamException

Sets the sort definition for this data provider.

refresh() method
void refresh( )

Refreshes the data provider.

After calling this method, if getModels(), getKeys() or getTotalCount() is called again, they will re-execute the query and return the latest data available.
